text: Hartenstein is a town in the rural district Zwickau, in Saxony, Germany. It is located on the river Zwickauer Mulde, 14 km southeast of Zwickau. Hartenstein has about 5,000 Inhabitants. ==Population== * 1834 - 1,708 * 1885 - 2,629 * 1933 - 2,973 * 1998 - 5,330 * 1999 - 5,383 * 2000 - 5,335 * 2001 - 5,198 * 2002 - 5,146 * 2003 - 5,095 * 2004 - 5,089 * 2005 - 5,056 * 2009 - 4,889 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Zwickau Rural District
title: Hartenstein, Saxony
